name: Death isn't a problem dude
description:
This was made by 2 people, for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam! 

This is our first game. So hello! The topic was stuck in a loop. 

When you win the game and finish the level you are teleported to the start, You are basically just stuck in an endless loop.  

As you know this is our first game so naturally the art is crap.     

Controls: 

A and D to move

 Space to jump

Shift to crouch 

O for options.
